docs.snippet: All Times EDTFriday, July 18AUTO RACING2:30 p.m....

Rupert Murdoch's 21st Century Fox Inc said on Wednesday it had offered to buy Time Warner Inc in a move that would unite two of the world's most powerful media conglomerates, but its move was rebuffed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rupert Murdoch's 21st Century Fox Inc said on Wednesday it had offered to buy Time Warner Inc in a move that would unite two of the world's most powerful media conglomerates, but its move was rebuffed.

docs.snippet: Some Republicans from metropolitan areas have joined many Democrats to oppose paring a program created to help businesses rebuild after attacks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some Republicans from metropolitan areas have joined many Democrats to oppose paring a program created to help businesses rebuild after attacks.
docs.abstract: House Republicans' efforts to pare federal terrorism insurance have caused some Republicans from metropolitan areas to join many Democrats in opposing move; program was created to help businesses rebuild after attacks of Sept 11, 2001.

headline.main: House Effort to Scale Down Federal Terrorism Insurance Divides Republicans
headline.print_headline: House Effort to Scale Down Federal Terrorism Insurance Divides Republicans

docs.snippet: The owner of the steamship United States, which carried many notable passengers in its heyday, is seeking to have the vessel converted into business space....
docs.lead_paragraph: The owner of the steamship United States, which carried many notable passengers in its heyday, is seeking to have the vessel converted into business space.
docs.abstract: SS United States Conservancy, struggling owner of steamship United States, is in talks with three developers about ship's potential to be converted into a business space like hotel, museum, mall or conference center facility; ship has been tied to Delaware River pier in Philadelphia since 1996.

docs.snippet: Although the takeover bid made in recent weeks by 21st Century Fox was unsuccessful, Time Warner may feel pressure to begin talks, potentially reshaping the media industry....
docs.abstract: Although the takeover bid made in recent weeks by 21st Century Fox was unsuccessful, Time Warner may feel pressure to begin talks, potentially reshaping the media industry.

headline.main: Murdoch Puts Time Warner on His Wish List

byline.original: By ANDREW ROSS SORKIN and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

docs.snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey is trailed by investigations about his tenure, but he is credited with a talent for street-level campaigning....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey is trailed by investigations about his tenure, but he is credited with a talent for street-level campaigning.
docs.abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie is making three-city swing through Iowa, first state to have a say in the presidential race; trip represents highly public resumption of his White House ambitions after six months of scandal, and indicates that his political standing has stabilized and his advisers see a possible path to the Republican nomination in 2016.

headline.main: Christie to Test Presidential Hopes in Iowa Trip
headline.print_headline: Christie to Test Presidential Hopes in Iowa Trip
